ComicInfo.Title: Pearlygate Papers; In the Sikhs; Albert; Oombah, Jungle Moon Man; Them Ther Cutesy-Pie Li'l Ol' Elves in the Majic Forest; A Life in the Day of Howie ("The Hat") Patterson; Dante's Disneyland; Stranger in a Strange Land; Stranger in a Strange Land; Dream of a Dog; Cheese on the Cross; Sternutalogy; So You Want to be a Channeler?; Top Level Meeting
